Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: We are proud to announce that the beta version of our platform is finally live and is already available for work in the Ethereum network. We’ve been eagerly waiting for this moment and now everything is at last set into motion.  After the extensive beta testing in the Ropsten network, we are at the long last happy to inform you that the SocialMedia.Market platform is now fully operational in the main Ethereum network. This has been our goal for a long time and If you’ve been looking forward to trying out our product in the field, the time has come – the release in the main network will allow you to start creating advertising campaigns right away. As a part of the announcement of this important milestone, we would like to thank everyone who was involved in the testing process. Your participation and feedback gave additional momentum to the platform development and evolution. Furthermore, our loyal customers are what inspires us to go onward, no matter the obstacles that lay in our path.  The achievement of this milestone doesn’t mean that we are taking pauses, however. We will continue to work hard to improve on what we’ve already accomplished and we will continue our effort to provide the best service possible.  If you haven’t had a chance to try out our platform when it was available in the testing environment – now is the best time for you to start!   Stay tuned for more news and updates on the SocialMedia.Market platform.

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: With more regulations arise each day, crypto environment and it rules change rapidly. Major exchanges lift the standards to coins they take on board. These new standards are based on updates in SEC regulation policies concerning utility token and are aimed to protect investors from fraud. To be listed on exchange as a utility token, it has to be implemented and used in the service as a payment method.  Apart from that, crypto industry has passed its period of uncontrolled growth. Only those project that aim for the long-term strategy and develop their product achieve success.  SocialMedia.Market aims for a long-term development and to fulfill interests of the platform and our token holders we made some reprioritization: 1. Our number one task right now is to implement SMT as a payment instrument. Yet today in the scope of this new course we released more features mandatory for the use of token on the platform:  🔍 Search categories 📢 Bloggers’ profiles with essential information 📈 Graphical display of amount of subscribers and likes of a blogger.  In the coming days we will deploy the smart contract of an advertising campaign on GitHub with a possibility for our community to test.  We will keep you updated on the news about our progress in new listings.  Thanks for your support!

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: 🔥 We have 2 great news at once!🔥  The first one: We are glad to share that we have successfully completed the audit of our ICO. Although it took a longer than we expected.  The second one: Now we are ready to announce that SMTs will be sent on the 16th of April! Till that time in order to get SMTs without any delay check to be sure that your ETH-wallet is right. You can check it in your personal account on ico.socialmedia.market.  Following the results of the audit, we have sold 45 077 302 Social Media tokens during the ICO. The popular currencies with which SMT where bought, were ETH (97%), BTC (2%) and LTC (0.6%). The remaining 0.4% of tokens have been purchased in other cryptocurrencies (Ripple became the most popular currency in this range). More than 3500 users have become our token holders.  Now we are making refunds as the audit has revealed that more than 100 contributors are citizens or residents of the United States. Please be reminded that Territorial legislature prohibits participation in ICOs. We have already sent emails to such users with more detailed information about refunds.  Thanks for keeping calm and staying in touch with us!

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Hi there!  That's so nice to hear things like that! Thank you for your feedback!  Make sure we do our best to create a high quality product.  To participate in ICO you need to create an account on https://ico.socialmedia.market/users/sign_up. When you are logged in you can choose the payment method most suitable for you (Step 2) and you will be provided with the address to send your deposit to.  Here's the list of the available payment methods: ETH, BTC, LTC, XRP, BCH, DASH, DOGE, NEO, XMR, ZEC  The funds will appear in your account wallets only after your cryptocurrency transaction gets 6 confirmations. You will receive an email about the successful deposit  Please note that if your balance is sufficient for the minimum purchase, the purchase of Social Media Tokens with the deposited funds is completed automatically.  The maximum invetment is 300 ETH.  Thank you so much for your support!  Track news on our website and social pages - announcements of all events of the project will appear there.

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Hello!  Thank you for your question and for your interest in SocialMedia.Market!  Socialmedia.market is the first decentralized ecosystem to discover, create, run and analyze advertising campaigns with social media influencers. Based on the blockchain technology it will bring marketing activities between brands and social media bloggers to the whole new level of transparency, safety and interaction.  Our platform will be integrated into all major social networks that are out there, meaning it will be available for influencers from all of them. Among others, here's a short list of benefits our platform will provide for brands & advertisers:  -Secure transactions based on blockchain technology -Smart contract creation in a single click -Fair Decentralised Dispute Settlement Solution -Ultimate results, smart planning with Real-Time Analytics and Data Science -Powerful and easy to navigate CRM system -Simple campaign reconciliation and control -Additional way to earn  Please take a look at a short presentation of our project containing the most important information about SocialMedia.Market: https://socialmedia.market/assets/pdf/SMM_Shorter_eng.pdf  If you have any more questions regarding SocialMedia.Market, we are always here to answer all of them!

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Thank you for the question!  First of all, holding a token grants you an ability to participate in Decentralized Dispute Solution System and being rewarded for your voting with more tokens. Next, we are issuing tokens for advertising platform, working on the biggest growing online advetising market - influencer marketing. Market size almost tripled  in the last two years and going to hit at least 10$b cap till the end of 2020. So you will be holding an in-demand tool for advertisers and influencers all over the world.  During the ICO you will be able to buy SMTs at an advantageous price. Thus we recommend everyone who has plans to use our service in the future to purchase SMTs during the ICO rather than on the cryptocurrency exchanges later.

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Hello!  Our team have tremendous experience in influencer marketing from the brand’s perspective and we ourselves know exactly what the main obstacles for effectiveness in this field are. We are creating a service that we wish would be out there for us as a brand and we know about all the problems that influencers come across when trying to monetize their channel (blog, page, etc), too. Our aim is to fix all those issues in a form of an ultimate solution that will not only significantly decrease expenses for every market participant but also make it a less time consuming process overall.   Managing of Influencer Marketing programs is currently a very challenging process and Influencer Marketing platforms, or agencies, require an advertiser to pay up to 50% commission for such services. With the help of our services, brands can expect to reduce the costs associated with launching Influencer Marketing campaigns significantly.   Our solution offers an easy, efficient, fast and secure way for brands and influencers to connect, agree upon the terms of a smart contact, create quality content and process the payment. Our service will also guarantee protection from scam and will see to it that the terms of the smart contact are met by both sides. No agents will be needed to materialize all of the above, but even in case one wishes to delegate duties to agents, they will get fees from our side and not from the influencer or advertiser.  All of the above will grant a significant reduction of the cost of marketing activities for those who will join SocialMedia.Market  By the way we already launched the beta version of our platform, so you have an ability to check it. You will see changes and updates during the ICO campaign. Our R&D department do not stop working on it. For sure, launch version will have mass of features implemented, which are still on development stage or have not been released in current version.  Please, check beta here: https://beta.socialmedia.market/   Thank you so much for your support!  Track news on our website and social pages - announcements of all events of the project will appear there.

Body: We are in Seoul at Korea Blockchain Symposium  Today our team presented SocialMedia.Market on Korea Blockchain Symposium in Seoul! It was great opportunity to tell about our platform, to declare yourself as an international project and to attract more people attention to our service!  “Thousands of people all over the world realize the value of influencer marketing and see it as a unique opportunity to promote their products and services. Unfortunately, not all of them understand how to use it. Our first priority is to create a single platform, accessible for users with all degrees of knowledge about the influencer marketing and blockchain. The rules of the game should be really clear to all participants”, — said founder and CEO of SocialMedia.Market during his speech on Korea Blockchain Symposium  We are happy that the audience approved the project with enthusiasm and highly appreciated it!  Blockchain Symposium is a SYNCO Investment’s monthly conference.  It’s the seventh conference, driving an increasing amount of registered investors and various stakeholders. In January the event gathered nearly 1,000 investors and blockchain industry representatives.  This month’s conference will feature nine different blockchain projects spanning a wide variety of industries from media to insurance.  SocialMedia.Market is the first decentralized marketplace connecting social media bloggers and advertisers. A solution to the major influencer marketing problems, it creates new opportunities for content monetization, community engagement and audience exposure. The new ecosystem, driven by blockchain technology and social media token, will simplify marketing interaction between business and influencers.  https://medium.com/@SocialMedia.M/we-are-in-seoul-at-korea-blockchain-symposium-8cfe9e44efca

Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Hi there!  Thank you for your question and for your interest in our project!  Actually many people asked us about Indahash and what is the difference between our projects.  Well, IndaHash has a business model of an agency, and they offer Instagram only. They have stated, that one of their primary interests in ico and blockchain is to lessen their burden of global payments.  SocialMedia.Market is a marketplace first of all. Marketplace provides transparent pricing, access to more bloggers from all major social networks and brands or businesses of any size.  A fair decetralized dispute solution, where other participants vote for decision, if an argument emreged between blogger and advertiser. It's a powerful tool for managing multiple campaigns with multiple bloggers across all major social netwroks in one place at once.  I hope I've cleared a bit where these two projects are different. Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Hello! Thank you for the question!  Social Media Token (SMT) will be issued as Ethereum based ERC 20 compatible token.  Social Media Token is designed to be the currency of SocialMedia.Market ecosystem, facilitating fund transfers between business, influencers or agents.  Basically, SMT is the internal currency of the platform and it will ensure transactions, data validity, campaign and contract creation. So, you can easily pay with SMT for influencers campaigns or vice versa.  Here's a short list of advantages SMT will provide to all parties as a single currency: -100% safe escrow transactions based on Blockchain technology -Low-cost transactions with less operation fees -Simplified and fast global payments -Earn rewards by participating in the decentralized dispute solution system -Utility tool for acquiring outstanding marketing services, premium analytics and development instruments.  In case you have any other questions regarding the project, we are always here for you!

It's a powerful tool for managing multiple campaigns with multiple bloggers across all major social netwroks in one place at once. Along with that platform will provide exclusive services for token holders. For example, fair decetralized dispute solution system, where other participants vote for decision, if an argument emreged between blogger and advertiser. This is the key difference between Indahash and our project.  Also it should be clarified that our team based in Kyiv, Ukraine. But nevertheless, we sure that it doesn't about location of the team it's about transparency and credibility. We are open in all social networks, we are experienced and we are supported by famous advisors. That indeed important things that deserve the attention of the community;)  Regarding your question about cooperation with brands. You know, actually it's an ongoing and complicated process. We're already in negotiations with many representatives of well-known companies but it must be clear that the business (brands) should see the practical value of our platform and it should be justified extensively. Follow our socials to to updated with bog partnership announcements. Nevertheless, our project was supported by the largest media portal about bloggers, opinion leaders and influencer marketing in general - Influencer Marketing Hub. Information about this you can find on the main page, as well as in the news and press releases about SocialMedia.Market.  How the product will work. Well we strong believe that it's better once to see, than hundred times to hear We will release beta version of our platform in few days, so you will be able to see in hands what you can achieve with our service. And with token issue in late February you will be able to start using our service for your Instagram and Youtube campaigns.  In addition here's a short list of unique benefits the platform will provide for brands & advertisers: - Secure transactions; - Fair Decentralized Dispute Solution; - Operating costs optimization; - Real-Time data analysis and ROI.  I hope I've cleared a bit the questions that were significant to you. But if you have any more questions, do not hesitate to write us here or join our Telegram chat. Our team will try to unfold any details you want to know.

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Influencer Marketing has arguably become the most effective long-term marketing strategy. 94% of marketers found this type of promotion very effective last year and are going to increase their budgets on this activity. But how to choose the right influencer for your campaign? We will try to understand.  ADVOCATES. People who have blogs or channels and really appreciate your products. Your fanbase. They are the most loyal and dedicated to your brand. So attract these people on mutually profitable terms. Moreover, they will certainly agree to make an integration with their favorite brand. The main thing is to make sure that the audience of these influencers is also interested in your product.  INFLUENCERS. This is the best option for advertising. Influencers have a huge audience on their channels or social media profiles and can bring lots of new customers. With millions of followers they fit perfectly for big brands. Also check carefully if their followers are relevant to your brand.  BRAND AMBASSADORS. They are celebrities or famous bloggers who endorse your company and represent it in a public area. Ambassadors speak on behalf of your brand at various events and engage the audience through their digital channels. This is typically a long-term collaboration, so you have to be ready for high prices.

Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Why do we use blockchain on SocialMedia.Market? There are several reasons. The blockchain technology will simplify the integration between advertisers and publishers and decrease costs for all engaged parties. Traditional payment methods require high processing fees and complicated banking and compliance procedures. Thanks to the SMT token and blockchain our platform is open for advertisers all over the world, making all payments low-cost and easy to proceed.  Also, blockchain will reduce fraud in the influencer marketing. A bogger is guaranteed to receive his payment, and an advertiser - the ad-integration. Such cooperation will be much safer and more transparent. Blockchain creates opportunities for thousands of influencers and brands all over the globe to form targeted audience exposure; engaging consumers in the most relevant way.  Blockchain has a big impact on digital marketing. You can read more about this in our article on Medium: https://medium.com/socialmedia-market/blockchain-as-a-new-way-to-develop-digital-marketing-d79670d0adf5

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: HOW TO FIND INFLUENCERS IN YOUR NICHE?  Finding the right influencer for an ad campaign is quite an issue. To begin with, their audience should be potentially interested in your product, so a blogger's channel should be close to the subject of your brand. For example, if you are promoting a cosmetics store, look for lifestyle or beauty bloggers. Their followers are your target audience. But how to find the right influencer? Here are several tips to help you solve this issue. 1. Do a Google Search for Local Bloggers. This short research will help you find experts in your niche. When you have a list of opinion leaders specializing in your topic, check their audience and channel content. This will help you choose the most suitable influencer in the future. 2. Check your own followers. A great way to find influencers is to analyze your own followers. Perhaps you have thematic bloggers who already have subscribed on your pages and use your product or service. If the influencer is interested in your brand, it will be much easier and cheaper to start advertising with him. 3. Look for a thematic hashtag. Bloggers often use thematic hashtags to simplify the search. Identify the most niche tags and check them in social networks. Of course, this analysis takes some time, but in the end you will be able to recruit several influencers for efficient promotion. 4. Grow your own micro-influencer network. Almost everyone has a profile in various of social networks, your team included. Analyze their profiles - maybe some will have a large enough audience that suits your goals. Moreover, your team members know the product well and can tell a lot about it.  We also recommend you to read our article "What your boss would like to know about influencer marketing", in which answers on the frequent questions about this marketing area: https://medium.com/socialmedia-market/what-your-boss-would-like-to-know-about-influencer-marketing-c9568ada5478

Body: Hello!  The service you have mentioned does operate in the same industry as we do but there are also the big difference between us. While Ecomobi offer tools to monetize your traffic on social media, we are creating SocialMedia.Market as an independent and decentralized ecosystem, designed as an ultimate solution for online advertising market challenges.  We are the first decentralized ecosystem to discover, create, run and analyze advertising campaigns with social media influencers.  So you can earn on social media marketing if you have an account on one of the popular social networks like Facebook, YouTube or Instagram. Using SocialMedia.Market platform you will be able to easily find a brand wishing to use your influencing capabilities to promote their goods or services. Influencers who want to be presented on SocialMedia.Market register an account within the platform. Each social media channel (if they possess more than one) is attached to this account and verified separately. Verification status of each channel will be displayed on a specific page in the Influencer’s profile.  Also, every user within the SocialMedia.Market platform, or any other person willing to become a resolution expert, has the opportunity to participate in decentralized Dispute Solution system and earn Social Media Tokens by voting in particular cases. To become an expert and to have the ability to vote for resolutions, a user should be holding a constant amount of SMTs, the number of which will be determined by the platform community.  We I hope that we answered your question. But don't hesitate to contact us if you have any additional questions;)

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: WHAT COUNTS AS A VIDEO VIEW? There is no doubt that the future of online marketing is bound up with online-video and live-streaming. But for many marketers there is a complicated issue on what metrics should the impact of their marketing activity in this area. Every platform has their own criteria for view tracking. For Facebook, Instagram Video, and Twitter a video-view is being tracked only during the first 3 seconds. For YouTube, it’s for 30 seconds and more. Snapchat tracks a view after the video is opened, as well as Instagram Stories and Instagram Live. Also, you can read our article on Medium about YouTube influencer marketing and the most effective types of ads with influencers: https://medium.com/socialmedia-market/youtube-influencer-marketing-most-effective-alternatives-to-pre-rolls-dcb99ef064e3

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Why is the SocialMedia.Market platform profitable for both bloggers and brands?                    SAFE AND FAST TRANSACTIONS. Delays or non-payments are problems typically associated with an Influencer’s platform. The advertisers and influencers have very little control over payments. Our Ethereum based platform uses an escrow payment system which holds the contract fees until the set obligations are met.                    FAIR DECENTRALISED DISPUTE SOLUTION. Content created by Influencers is mostly perceived subjectively. This may cause disputes and dissatisfaction of parties with achieved results. Our service has several preventive measures that will allow parties to resolve disputes on their own in most cases, as well as an arbitration system that will resolve disputes between participants with the help of independent platform experts.                    OWNERSHIP VALIDATION. One of the major problems contributing to most of the unforeseen costs is fraud, when a fraudster impersonates an Influencer by hacking into his accounts. SocialMedia.Market applies special procedures providing a transparent and reliable marketplace. Influencers are verified and authorized to ensure they are really who they claim to be. Read more about our platform here: https://socialmedia.market

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Hello! Thank you for your feedback and your question!  First of all, let me say that our project is not about all advertising on the Internet. The field we work in is influencer marketing.  Influencer Marketing is about content, created by bloggers and published in social media networks like Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, etc. This kind of content gives marketers a wide range of application. From straight forward advertisement of a product to creation of a social conversation around their brand. Influencer Marketing is a growing market, which will reach $5-$10B till end of 2020. And like any market on the stage of development, Influencer Marketing has several core issues that stagger its development. Being early adopters of the strategy (since 2015), we have experienced these issues ourselves. We have faced fraud, uncertain pricing, high overall fees, complex interaction, and complicated global payments. The general idea behind the SocialMedia.Market project is to solve these major issues with Blockchain and Smart Contracts technologies. This new tech allows to create a safe, transparent, and decentralized platform for managing and measuring Influencer Marketing for everyone anywhere.  There are platforms operating in the same industry as we do. Nevertheless, SocialMedia.Market clearly stands out due to several core differences. The main difference here is in the approach. We are creating SocialMedia.Market as an independent and decentralized ecosystem, designed as a solution for online advertising market challenges. It will bring influencer marketing to a whole new level, providing a convenient solution for advertisers and a reliable source of income for bloggers, all in a single marketplace. Bringing blockchain to the core of the platform, we are building transparent, secure, fair and trustable ecosystem for every market participant. SocialMedia.Market is a platform that will open the gateway to Influencer Marketing for everyone. We are focused on every major social network, not fixing our efforts on just one or few of them. It will allow bloggers worldwide to get a bite at global online advertising budgets. As for the advertisers, we believe that the opportunities of this strategy are not limited to the brands with huge budgets. Influencer Marketing is extremely effective for businesses of any size, online and offline. SocialMedia.Market will become the marketplace to satisfy specific needs of any advertiser. And this is why we are implementing blockchain and smart contract technologies here. We want to create a flexible and adjustable system, unhindered by limitations of existing solutions.  Also, answering your question, it’s impossible not to dwell upon Social Media Token (SMT) which is designed to be the currency of SocialMedia.Market ecosystem, facilitating fund transfers between business, influencers or agents. Basically, SMT is the internal currency of the platform and it will ensure transactions, data validity, campaign and contract creation. So, you can easily pay with SMT for influencers campaigns or vice versa. Here's a short list of advantages SMT will provide to all parties as a single currency: -100% safe escrow transactions based on Blockchain technology -Low-cost transactions with less operation fees -Simplified and fast global payments -Earn rewards by participating in the decentralized dispute solution system -Utility tool for acquiring outstanding marketing services, premium analytics and development instruments   If you have any more questions, do not hesitate to write us here. Our team will try to unfold any details you want to know. Please consider getting acquainted with the White Paper  Also, here is our short presentation of the project which contains all the most important information about us and will allow you to get a more clear general idea about our service.

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Hello!  Thank you for the question!  Social Media Market will help bloggers in monetizing their content on every popular platforms and also managing their accounts. Managing of Influencer Marketing programs is currently a very challenging process and Influencer Marketing platforms, or agencies, require an advertiser to pay up to 50% commission for such services. With the help of our services, brands can expect to reduce the costs associated with launching Influencer Marketing campaigns significantly. Our solution offers an easy, efficient, fast and secure way for brands and influencers to connect, agree upon the terms of a smart contact, create quality content and process the payment. Our service will also guarantee protection from scam and will see to it that the terms of the smart contact are met by both sides. No agents will be needed to materialize all of the above, but even in case one wishes to delegate duties to agents, they will get fees from our side and not from the influencer or advertiser. All of the above will grant a significant reduction of the cost of marketing activities for those who will join SocialMedia.Market and also will create ecosystem where influencers can easily access sponsorship for creating good quality content. Also please notice that the platform fee will be not more than 10%.  If you have any more questions, do not hesitate to write us here. Our team will try to unfold any details you want to know. And don't forget to join our Telegram chat. It's open for everyone to discuss and check all the latest news and updates about the project.

Body: Hello!  So you can earn on social media marketing if you have an account on one of the popular social networks like Facebook, YouTube or Instagram. Using SocialMedia.Market platform you will be able to easily find a brand wishing to use your influencing capabilities to promote their goods or services. Influencers who want to be presented on SocialMedia.Market register an account within the platform. Each social media channel (if they possess more than one) is attached to this account and verified separately. Verification status of each channel will be displayed on a specific page in the Influencer’s profile. Also, every user within the SocialMedia.Market platform, or any other person willing to become a resolution expert, has the opportunity to participate in decentralized Dispute Solution system and earn Social Media Tokens by voting in particular cases. To become an expert and to have the ability to vote for resolutions, a user should be holding a constant amount of SMTs, the number of which will be determined by the platform community. Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Hello!  Thank you so much for your support! It is a great pleasure for us!  Well all companies should always stay on top and be ready to adapt every minute changes. Flexibility and readiness to take new challenges increases the chance of success in this "dog-eat-dog world"  Our team have tremendous experience in influencer marketing from the brand’s perspective and we ourselves know exactly what the main obstacles for effectiveness in this field are. We are creating a service that we wish would be out there for us as a brand and we know about all the problems that influencers come across when trying to monetize their channel (blog, page, etc), too. Our aim is to fix all those issues in a form of an ultimate solution that will not only significantly decrease expenses for every market participant but also make it a less time consuming process overall.   Managing of Influencer Marketing programs is currently a very challenging process and Influencer Marketing platforms, or agencies, require an advertiser to pay up to 50% commission for such services. With the help of our services, brands can expect to reduce the costs associated with launching Influencer Marketing campaigns significantly.   Our solution offers an easy, efficient, fast and secure way for brands and influencers to connect, agree upon the terms of a smart contact, create quality content and process the payment. Our service will also guarantee protection from scam and will see to it that the terms of the smart contact are met by both sides. No agents will be needed to materialize all of the above, but even in case one wishes to delegate duties to agents, they will get fees from our side and not from the influencer or advertiser.  All of the above will grant a significant reduction of the cost of marketing activities for those who will join SocialMedia.Market  So as you can see the future is now and the platform you talked about is already on beta development stage;) It planned to be released in February 2018. So you have an ability to check it out soon.  Track news on our website and social pages - announcements of all events of the project will appear there.

To become an expert and to have the ability to vote for resolutions, a user should be holding a constant amount of SMTs, the number of which will be determined by the platform community. Quote from: Pipshunter on November 30, 2017, 12:01:50 PM i have a questions , how this projects gonna change our perspective in others social media such as facebook and twitter? what kind of benefits we get from this project/platform ? what your platform offers us than others ico projects?    Hello!  Thank you for your question and for your interest in our project!  The general idea behind the SocialMedia.Market project is to solve these major issues with Blockchain and Smart Contracts technologies. This new tech allows to create a safe, transparent, and decentralized platform for managing and measuring Influencer Marketing for everyone anywhere.  Social Media Token (SMT) is designed to be the currency of SocialMedia.Market ecosystem, facilitating fund transfers between business, influencers or agents. Basically, SMT is the internal currency of the platform and it will ensure transactions, data validity, campaign and contract creation. So you can easily pay with SMT for influencers campaigns or vice versa.  SocialMedia.Market clearly stands out from other similar ICO projects due to several core differences. The main difference here is in the approach. We are creating SocialMedia.Market as an independent and decentralized ecosystem, designed as a solution for online advertising market challenges, not only internal issues with bank compliance. It will bring influencer marketing to a whole new level, providing a convenient solution for advertisers and a reliable source of income for bloggers, all in a single marketplace.  Bringing blockchain to the core of the platform and implementing smart contracts, we are building transparent, secure, flexible, adjustable, fair and trustable ecosystem for every market participant. Our platform will be opened for bloggers and influencers from every major social network (Instagram, Youtube, Twitter, Facebook, Snapchat, Twitch, etc) and advertisers of any kind: applications, stores, services, brands, small and middle local businesses and anyone interested in promoting their product via Influencer Marketing.   If you have any more questions, do not hesitate to write us here. Our team will unfold any details you want to know.

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Hi there!  Thank you for your interest in SocialMedia.Market and for your question! That's really nice one    So market strategy for advertisers won’t be limited by geo, social network or any other means. For example, if you are running a webservice from Chicago, but your main audience located in LATAM, you can easily find relevant influencer there. You will need to target the campaign to preferred countries, set audience language, age, interests, influencers’ channel size, audience engagement rate etc. After campaign will be created smart matching system will offer you list of influencers opened for business opportunities and meeting your requirements. Or you can run platform's search engine, using your specific criteria. In anyway, SocialMedia.Market will give an opportunity to interact with influencers, bloggers and streamers worldwide using precise tools for finding relevant advertising channels, giving biggest exposure to your marketing campaigns. As for attracting influencers to the platform: after launching the platform, we will focus on attracting advertisers during brand awareness campaign. Bringing marketing budgets on the platform will open business and monetization opportunities for influencers of all kinds. Open and transparent marketplace and not the agency-like model, is the key to continuous business relationships between advertisers and influencers.  We I hope that we answered your question. But don't hesitate to contact us if you have any additional questions;) We will be happy to provide you with any details!

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Hello!  Thank you for your question and for your interest in our project!  So let me explain the difference between SocialMedia.Market and Adnetwork. SocialMedia.Market is a platform, designed for Influencer Marketing. Influencer Marketing is about content, created by bloggers and published in social media networks like Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, etc. This kind of content gives marketers a wide range of application. From straight forward advertisement of a product to creation of a social conversation around their brand.  From a brief research on Adnetwork, it looks like they are building an “Advertising network” on Blockchain. That’s a completely different business model – they connect advertisers with websites willing to host advertisements. Mainly advertising networks work with banners.  Social Media Token (SMT) is designed to be the currency of SocialMedia.Market ecosystem, facilitating fund transfers between business, influencers or agents. Basically, SMT is the internal currency of the platform and it will ensure transactions, data validity, campaign and contract creation. So you can easily pay with SMT for influencers campaigns or vice versa. Here's a short list of advantages SMT will provide to all parties as a single currency: 100% safe escrow transactions based on Blockchain technology; low-cost transactions with less operation fees; simplified and fast global payments; earn rewards by participating in the decentralized dispute solution system; utility tool for acquiring outstanding marketing services; premium analytics and development instruments.  We I hope that we answered your question and all is clear for now. But don't hesitate to contact us if you have any additional questions;) We will be happy to provide you with any details!

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Hi there  Thank for your question.  SocialMedia.Market’s core functionality will be maintained by a utility token - Social Media Token (SMT). SMTs will be necessary to create and pay for marketing campaigns, to pay for additional services and tools within the platform (e.g. support of personal agent for bloggers; adhance tools and researches for brands), to pay for self-promotion campaigns by bloggers.  All token holders will be able to earn rewards in SMT within the platform by participating in dispute system.  Also, SMTs will be transferable outside the platform. Social Media Token holders will be able to operate on largest digital currency exchanges, where potential platform users will be purchasing SMTs in order to use platform services. Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: We have always known that there would be obstacles on our way of creating such a complete solution. Though, with the team and the plan we have, no obstacles are strong enough to stop us. We know exactly how to overcome them and even to use them to our advantage.  As I explained in one of the messages above, we are creating a marketplace to fix every significant issue that both the influencer and the brand currently meet on their way to creating quality content. And the hurdles in this market are the same for everybody, even for such giants as Coca-Cola, Nike and Apple. They know best about the immense power and potential of influencer marketing and they’ve been using it for years now. There is no doubt they will apply to it even more in their future marketing campaigns, and having a service to make all their social media marketing activities more efficient, convenient and faster gives them all a clear improvement with absolutely no risk. It will take them less time and cost to discover, create, run and analyze advertising campaigns with social media influencers using our marketplace.  We are building a transparent, secure, fair, trustable and easy-to-use ecosystem and every reasonable brand seeking promotion with social media marketing will join us just because we will make their life easier and better. The same goes for influencers, by the way.

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Quote from: Crystal Method on November 18, 2017, 03:27:09 PM Quote from: SocialMediaMarket on November 17, 2017, 11:18:56 PM Quote from: Crystal Method on November 17, 2017, 01:50:01 PM How do you think will be in the future such platform (or platforms) reduce budjets for marketing and whole costs for the marketing activities ? We have tremendous experience in influencer marketing from the brand’s perspective and we ourselves know exactly what the main obstacles for effectiveness in this field are. We are creating a service that we wish would be out there for us as a brand and we know about all the problems that influencers come across when trying to monetize their channel (blog, page, etc), too. Our aim is to fix all those issues in a form of an ultimate solution that will not only significantly decrease expenses for every market participant but also make it a less time consuming process overall.   Managing of Influencer Marketing programs is currently a very challenging process and Influencer Marketing platforms, or agencies, require an advertiser to pay up to 50% commission for such services. With the help of our services, brands can expect to reduce the costs associated with launching Influencer Marketing campaigns significantly.  Our solution offers an easy, efficient, fast and secure way for brands and influencers to connect, agree upon the terms of a smart contact, create quality content and process the payment. Our service will also guarantee protection from scam and will see to it that the terms of the smart contact are met by both sides. No agents will be needed to materialize all of the above, but even in case one wishes to delegate duties to agents, they will get fees from our side and not from the influencer or advertiser. All of the above will grant a significant reduction of the cost of marketing activities for those who will join SocialMedia.Market   Thanks for the clarification. But I join to question above : "Will your platform reduce relevance of the advertising agents on market down to zero? " It seems that when you will launch your platform at full power, there are will be no place for agents in common role like they are now. In that case I dont think these people will support the development of your product.. Correct me if Im wrong.  Yes, there is a bounty campaign that you may learn about and join following this link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2321059.0 Also, please join our Telegram chat and the chat dedicated to the bounty campaign as well  Now I’d like to clarify the role of agents in our project. Our service will indeed be good enough for brands and influencers to effectively interact and manage campaigns without a need for agents. However, we realize that a number of companies and influencers prefer to handle their business via agents and will continue to do so. That’s why we will make it possible for them to be represented by agents. SocialMedia.Market will also provide opportunities in extra earnings for market platform agencies. Any agent will be able to become a partner of the service and receive commission in Social Media Tokens for the provision of additional services for advertisers’ marketing campaigns or become a personal manager to influencers. We emphasize that the commission fee paid to the agents will come from our end and not the pocket of influencers or advertisers. The platform will be a convenient tool for searching and managing business opportunities. With the help of service agents, one can easily manage the schedule of advertising content or check effectiveness of advertising campaigns using the extended set of tools, anytime and anywhere.

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: The service you have mentioned does operate in the same industry as we do but the difference between us is clear. While Synereo offer a basic set of tools for their users to create and monetize their content, we are creating SocialMedia.Market as an independent and decentralized ecosystem, designed as an ultimate solution for online advertising market challenges.  We are the first decentralized ecosystem to discover, create, run and analyze advertising campaigns with social media influencers.   We will bring influencer marketing to a whole new level, providing a convenient solution for advertisers and a reliable source of income for bloggers, all in a single marketplace. Bringing blockchain to the core of the platform, we are building transparent, secure, fair and trustable ecosystem for every market participant. SocialMedia.Market is a platform that will open the gateway to Influencer Marketing for everyone. We are going to work with every major social network, not limiting our efforts on just one or two of them. It will allow bloggers worldwide, small and big, to be a crucial part of global online advertising process.  As for the advertisers, we believe that the opportunities of our solution are not limited to the brands with huge budgets. Influencer marketing is extremely effective for businesses of any size, online and offline. SocialMedia.Market will become the marketplace to satisfy specific needs of anyone who needs to be effectively promoted. And this is why we are implementing blockchain and smart contract technologies here. We want to create a flexible and adjustable system, unhindered by limitations of existing solutions.  If you have any other questions regarding our project, please feel free to ask them here or join us in our Telegram chat.

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: We have tremendous experience in influencer marketing from the brand’s perspective and we ourselves know exactly what the main obstacles for effectiveness in this field are. We are creating a service that we wish would be out there for us as a brand and we know about all the problems that influencers come across when trying to monetize their channel (blog, page, etc), too. Our aim is to fix all those issues in a form of an ultimate solution that will not only significantly decrease expenses for every market participant but also make it a less time consuming process overall.   Managing of Influencer Marketing programs is currently a very challenging process and Influencer Marketing platforms, or agencies, require an advertiser to pay up to 50% commission for such services. With the help of our services, brands can expect to reduce the costs associated with launching Influencer Marketing campaigns significantly.  Our solution offers an easy, efficient, fast and secure way for brands and influencers to connect, agree upon the terms of a smart contact, create quality content and process the payment. Our service will also guarantee protection from scam and will see to it that the terms of the smart contact are met by both sides. No agents will be needed to materialize all of the above, but even in case one wishes to delegate duties to agents, they will get fees from our side and not from the influencer or advertiser. All of the above will grant a significant reduction of the cost of marketing activities for those who will join SocialMedia.Market

Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥

The main difference here is in the approach. We are creating SocialMedia.Market as an independent and decentralized ecosystem, designed as a solution for online advertising market challenges, not only internal issues with bank compliance. It will bring influencer marketing to a whole new level, providing a convenient solution for advertisers and a reliable source of income for bloggers, all in a single marketplace. Bringing blockchain to the core of the platform, we are creating transparent, secure, fair and trustable ecosystem for every market participant. SocialMedia.Market is a platform, that will open the gateway to Influencer Marketing for everyone. And yes, TarzanNJane is right, we are focusing on every major social network - YouTube, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Twitch, Snapchat and others. It will allow bloggers worldwide to get a bite at global online advertising budgets.  As for the advertisers, we believe that the opportunities of this strategy are not limited to the brands with huge budgets. Influencer Marketing is extremely effective for businesses of any size, online and offline. SocialMedia.Market will become the marketplace to satisfy specific needs of any advertiser. And this is why we are implementing blockchain and smart contract technologies here. We want to create a flexible and adjustable system, unhindered by limitations of existing solutions. Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: First of all, thank you for the question. Let me clarify the difference between SocialMedia.Market and Adnetwork. SocialMedia.Market is a platform, designed for Influencer Marketing. Influencer Marketing is about content, created by bloggers and published in social media networks like Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, etc. This kind of content gives marketers a wide range of application. From straight forward advertisement of a product to creation of a social conversation around their brand. Influencer Marketing is a growing market, which will reach $5-$10B till end of 2020. And like any market on the stage of development, Influencer Marketing has several core issues that stagger its development. Being early adopters of the strategy (since 2015), we have experienced these issues ourselves. We have faced fraud, uncertain pricing, high overall fees, complex interaction, and complicated global payments. The general idea behind the SocialMedia.Market project is to solve these major issues with Blockchain and Smart Contracts technologies. This new tech allows to create a safe, transparent, and decentralized platform for managing and measuring Influencer Marketing for everyone anywhere. From a brief research on Adnetwork, it looks like they are building an “Advertising network” on Blockchain. That’s a completely different business model – they connect advertisers with websites willing to host advertisements. Mainly advertising networks work with banners.  Social Media Token (SMT) is designed to be the currency of SocialMedia.Market ecosystem, facilitating fund transfers between business, influencers or agents. Basically, SMT is the internal currency of the platform and it will ensure transactions, data validity, campaign and contract creation. So, you can easily pay with SMT for influencers campaigns or vice versa. Here's a short list of advantages SMT will provide to all parties as a single currency: 100% safe escrow transactions based on Blockchain technology Low-cost transactions with less operation fees Simplified and fast global payments Earn rewards by participating in the decentralized dispute solution system Utility tool for acquiring outstanding marketing services, premium analytics and development instruments

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Thanks for your note!  To make everything clear, R.Games is a public name of a computer games distribution brand, which was incorporated into Resume Games Limited in May 2015. You can check the registration certificate copy here: http://prntscr.com/h4twp1RG Also you can check the information on the verified account at the G2A.COM platform, which operates for https://www.g2a.com/user/rgames. The company has been operating there since 2014 and is listed among the TOP-5 vendors on the platform http://prntscr.com/h4u6xc  The rgames.co domain has been recently registered to create a business landing that provides the general info on the company. This practice is widely applied by companies that are entering the public.  As for Nontita Limited, it was incorporated in March 2016, proved by a registration certificate, a copy of which is available here: http://prntscr.com/h4tvvn  Moreover, the company has another domain - http://nontita.com/, which was registered in July 2016: https://www.nic.ru/whois/?query=nontita.com We reserved it for internal operations and services and didn’t use it as an information resource. Nevertheless, when you follow the link, you will be redirected to the business landing http://nontita.co  We thank you for your vigilance, zeal, and for taking your time to register on Bitcointalk to express your concerns. We should all put effort to protect the community of blockchain from any scam or abuse attempts.  Our goal is to create a service, which will bring transparency and fair rules to the influencer marketing industry. With the use of blockchain and smart contract technologies it becomes possible to implement all the instruments and make sure that the interests of every influencer and advertiser are protected.  If you have any questions left, we’ll be happy to answer them. Also, please join the conversation in the Telegram

Author: Aukoue
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: ◈◈ JOIN REFERRAL PROGRAM! Earn 5%◈◈ ◈◈ BOUNTY ◈◈ WEBSITE ◈◈ WHITEPAPER ◈◈ TWITTER ◈◈ FACEBOOK ◈◈ TELEGRAM ◈◈     SocialMedia.Market - THE FIRST DECENTRALIZED MARKETPLACE CONNECTING SOCIAL MEDIA BLOGGERS AND ADVERTISERS.  Solving major Influencer Marketing problems it will create new opportunities for CONTENT MONETISATION, COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT and AUDIENCE EXPOSURE. New ecosystem, driven by blockchain technology and social media token, will simplify marketing interaction BETWEEN BUSINESS AND INFLUENCERS.     SocialMedia.Market targets one of the fastest-growing markets, Influencer Marketing. Analytical reports show an increase in almost all metrics related to Influencer Marketing. Growing exponentially, by recent estimates this market will turn into a $5–10 billion industry by the end of 2020.   According to recent researches, brands that used influencer strategies reported an average return of $11.69 for every dollar spent. Furthermore, that 92% of consumers are more likely to trust a brand that advertises using Influencer Marketing. More over, it is more cost-effective than paid advertising and leads to more credible brand recommendations. For these reasons, Influencer Marketing has arguably became the most effective long term marketing strategy.  Despite the quick growth and development, the Influencer Marketing industry is highly opaque and chaotic with no regulations and an army of agents and scammers. This causing inefficiency in pricing, while agent fees and fraud consume a large portion of the influencer’s revenue and the brands’ marketing budgets.  SocialMedia.Market  is designed to solve these problems by making Influencer Marketing an accessible, transparent and competitive marketplace that will open opportunities for thousands of influencers and brands all over the globe, forming targeted audience exposure and engaging consumers in the most relevant and efficient way.    SOCIALMEDIA.MARKET WILL CREATE A NEW GENERATION OF ADVERTISING ACCESSIBLE TO MILLIONS OF NOVICE AND GROWING INFLUENCERS, STARTUPS, SMALL AND MEDIUM BUSINESSES.      A short list of advantages that SocialMedia.Market  will provide to all parties as a service:  TRANSPARENT and competitive marketplace WIDE range of social media : Youtube, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, etc REDUCED operational costs and fees when working with Influencer campaigns ACCESSIBLE and easy-to-use, even for small businesses and influencers in the early stage of social presence SMART partnership for a wide range of users with the ability to create smart contracts tailored to specific needs via templates and smart tips FAIR dispute solution based on decentralised Blockchain technology ULTIMATE results, smart planning with Real-Time Analytics and Data Science GLOBAL outreach allows project to aim for larger market share, higher diversity and less dependency on local regulations    With smart contracts technology, SocialMedia.Market can solve the issues of Influencer Marketing and set a new industry standard. Special features will be delivered to provide full transparency, accountability and security over negotiated transactions using our own cryptocurrency - Social Media Tokens (SMT).   A short list of advantages that SMT will provide to all parties as a single currency:  100% safe escrow transactions based on Blockchain technology Low-cost transactions with less operation fees Simplified and fast global payments Earning rewards by participating in Decentralized dispute solution system Getting agent commission within the platform Donations method for bloggers and streamers Utility tool for acquiring outstanding marketing services, premium analytics and development instruments   All operations within the SocialMedia.Market ecosystem are executed with its utility cryptocurrency token - Social Media Token (SMT), which ensures high standards of services and prevents any unauthorized manual intervention in the processes within the system. Social Media Token will create self-driven economy based on constant cooperation between influencers, advertisers, marketing agencies and agents. Token value is going to be upholded not only by simple transaction means within platform services, but also supported with ability to participate in decentralized dispute solution system gaining additional earnings for token holders.    Utilized, but not limited to SocialMedia.Market, SMTs will be transferable outside the platform. Social Media Token holders will be able to operate on largest digital currency exchanges, where potential platform users will be purchasing SMTs in order to use platform services. Along with it, SocialMedia.Market - itself is going to buy-back SMTs from exchanges to supply the platform's core functionality. The integration within blockchain assets payment platform like TenX, has the potential to make SMT a popular day-to-day payment method within the social media network e-commerce and the industry as a whole. It can also become a convenient global donation method for bloggers and streamers on the early stages of their content channel development.  With our core team know-how and expertise in entertainment, marketing, analysis and product development, we have a clear vision of how to implement blockchain and smart-contract technology in a day-to-day solution that will resolve market needs and help develop it, exponentially.        Social Media Tokens (SMTs) will be issued as ERC20 compatible tokens. Based on the amount of tokens contributed during both sale phases, 15% more tokens will be issued for platform core functionality (6 months of vesting period) and 5% for partners and advisors. This will form the total amount of SMTs ever issued.  15% of tokens issued for team and platform core functionality will be locked for 6 month 5% issued for platform core functionality will be unlocked immediately after vesting period ends 10% of tokens issued for the team will be proportionally released during next 12 month  Contributed funds will be allocated in ETH and USD in equal proportion, order to cover operational expenses on time.    TOKEN SALE SOFT CAP: 1 600 ETH (5 000 000 SMT)                TOKEN SALE HARD CAP: 16 000 ETH (MAX. 58 000 000 SMT)   Token sale Phase 1. PRE-ICO  CLOSED. SOFT CAP REACHED. 7 553 358,45 SMT SOLD.  Start date: 7 December 2017 12:00 PM GMT (1:00 pm CET) End date:   21 December 2017 12:00 PM GMT (1:00 pm CET)  Token exchange rate: 1 ETH = 3000 SMT Minimum contribution amount: 0,01 ETH / 30 SMT Maximum contribution amount: unlimited Contribution methods: ETH, BTC  Bonuses Pre-sale: 30% Public sale: 10%  Token sale Phase 2. ICO  Start date: 9 February 2018 12:00 pm GMT (1:00 pm CET) End date: 16 March 2018 12:00 pm GMT (1:00 pm CET) Pre-sale: 2-9 February 2018 12:00 PM GMT (1:00 pm CET)  Minimal goal: REACHED DURING PRE-ICO Phase Hard cap: 16 000 ETH  Token exchange rate: 1 ETH = 2500 SMT Minimum contribution amount: 0,1 ETH / 250 SMT Maximum contribution amount: 300 ETH Contribution methods: ETH, BTC, LTC, XRP, BCH, DASH, DOGE, ETC, NEO, XMR, ZEC  Bonuses Pre-Sale: 20% (min. contribution 25 ETH) Public Sale: Days 1-5: 15%, Days 6-20: 10%, Days 21-35: 5% Referral program bonus: GIVE 3%, GET 5%           MEDIA ABOUT US      OUR SOCIAL MEDIA GROUPS     DOCUMENTS

Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: I am looking forward to this one, I think this is cool and there must be many other people who had thought we need a platform like this. Can you please tell, what countries do you target your business first and foremost?

Author: SocialMediaMarket
Title: ⚡️[ANN][ICO]🔥SocialMedia.Market🔥TOKEN SALE IS CLOSED! THANK YOU FOR SUPPORT!🔥
Body: Thank you for a question. We are planing to operate worldwide, meaning every country where social netwoks exist. At the same time, brand awareness activities will be divided on two phases:  Q3 2018 - launch in US, UK and CIS - main Influencer Marketing markets Q1 2019 - global launch with worldwide marketing and educational campaigns  Nevertheless, platform functionality will be accessible globaly from the early beginning of SocialMedia.Market release for every participant.
